other_tests.findings: Diffuse lipids and cholesteryl ester in the retina; apolipoprotein B and macrophages colocalized in the perivascular space.
Demonstrated capillary nonperfusion throughout the posterior poles; marked leakage of fluorescein associated with macular edema.
Focal laser photocoagulation aimed at leaking microaneurysms in both eyes.
Reduction in lipid panel: total cholesterol 165 mg/dl, triglycerides 506 mg/dl, LDL 41 mg/dl, HDL 23 mg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased retinal thickening and hard exudate in the macular area observed.
